author: vors
body:
## Steps to reproduce

On OS X run `(ps powershell).Path`
## Expected behavior

Show Path to powershell processes
## Actual behavior

Hang

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/816680/15276590/51012c6a-1aa1-11e6-89a1-afb74f3b87ee.png)
## Environment data

Please fill in the results of the following commands:

``` sh
PS /Users/vors> dotnet --info
.NET Command Line Tools (1.0.0-preview1-002702)

Product Information:
 Version:     1.0.0-preview1-002702
 Commit Sha:  6cde21225e

Runtime Environment:
 OS Name:     Mac OS X
 OS Version:  10.11
 OS Platform: Darwin
 RID:         osx.10.11-x64
PS /Users/vors> cd ./dev/PowerShell/
PS /Users/vors/dev/PowerShell> git rev-parse HEAD; git status
9401e4f30fb30c89bfcd24a35a8934678c8ff09c
On branch vors/publish
Untracked files:
  (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)

    powershell-0.3.0-265-g9401e4f.pkg
    src/monad/

nothing added to commit but untracked files present (use "git add" to track)
PS /Users/vors/dev/PowerShell> 
```
title: (ps powershell).Path hangs
